description: This file defines a RealtimeService class responsible for establishing and managing a Server-Sent Events (SSE) connection for real-time attendance updates using HTTP streaming.

classes.name: RealtimeService
classes.description: A client for connecting to and listening to server-sent events (SSE) for real-time updates, specifically attendance updates.

methods.name: RealtimeService
methods.description: Constructor initializing the service with an optional HTTP client.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Establishes an SSE connection to the specified URI to receive real-time events, with optional headers.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Cleans up resources by disconnecting and closing streams and the HTTP client.
